about_the_game:
CATCH ME IF YOU CAN is a multiplayer hide & seek game that immerses you into the world of Slavic mythology. Pick the role and play as one of the heroes, each having unique abilities.

Ready or not, here I come!


The seekers have magic in their sleeves, which they can unleash at any moment. Teleporting and appearing right in front of the hider's coward face or using the powers of the forest to set a trap, and much more. It's magic! Their goal is to catch all the hiders getting in their way.

This world is wonderful and seeks protection!


Each hider has their own abilities to help them disguise and avoid getting caught. Transformation into objects, dash, invisibility, and more - all available to the hiders. Their task is to complete various missions located in different parts of the map, thereby calming the enraged hunter.

Time to have fun!

Gather your friends and compete in agility, speed, and accuracy in CATCH ME IF YOU CAN!

Each hider has their own abilities to help them disguise and avoid getting caught. Transformation into objects, dash, invisibility, and more - all available to the hiders. Their task is to complete various missions located in different parts of the map, thereby calming the enraged hunter.

name: CATCH ME IF YOU CAN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: CATCH ME IF YOU CAN is a multiplayer hide & seek game that immerses you into the world of Slavic mythology. Pick the role and play as one of the heroes, each having unique abilities.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
